definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
lit. to insult a bald man while pointing at a monk (idiom)/fig. to insult indirectly/to criticize obliquely
pinyin: zhi3 zhe5 he2 shang5 ma4 tu1 zi5

sentences.english: No way, Jose! You almost made Kevin bald when you did his hair.
sentences.chinese: 沒門，你給凱文理髮的時候，差點給他理成了禿子。

sentences.english: The airless Mexican walked boldly out.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥禿子大模大樣地走了出去。

sentences.english: He hastily pocketed the two Rs. 100 notes the bald man discreetly held out.
sentences.chinese: 他匆忙地收好了禿子小心地拿出的100的支票。

sentences.english: I declare! so the deacon's goin' to try his hand on Old Baldy, eh?
sentences.chinese: 我敢說，執事打算要衝老禿子下手了，嗯？

definition: smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
to make a long story short (idiom)
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
(usu used in the negative) to be of importance or to matter/to be in the way/to be a hindrance
